title: Devil's Cut
description: • To save my company, I’ll make a deal with the devil himself •We have a story in my family that’s been handed down from generation to generation, warning against vampires, painting them as nothing more than dangerous killers. But then I meet Bastian Forge, and discover everything I was told was a lie.He’s powerful. He's beautiful. He’s enigmatic.And now I owe him, bigtime. When Bastian unlocks my gift—I can read vampire minds—he opens up a whole new world, teaching me how to use my newfound powers. But as our enemies close in, I’m not sure who to trust, because while Forge keeps his secrets?I have my own, and neither of us will leave the other unscathed.
author: L.A. McGinnis
